display_long_description:
- "Simple to learn, hard to master and addictive fun!" Gamertag VR
- "The Next Era of Rhythm Gaming!" – Naysy, VR YouTube Star
- "A rhythm revolution—addictive and immersive!" MissChiefVR
- “That ‘aha!’ moment when creativity gifts you something special!“ Money Mark—Beastie Boys
- “Genius” RoadToVR

BEATABLE is the ultimate hand-tracking rhythm action game, built for MR + VR. Turn any table into a musical instrument—tap, snap, and clap to the beat using just your hands.

With pinpoint gesture detection and real-world haptics, every move feels precise, natural, and deeply satisfying.

Full Launch Includes:
- Custom song + map editor — create, share, and compete on custom tracks
- 24 songs (12 in Early Access), incl. a J-Pop anthem by Kudo Haruka and a heavy-hitter from Mikee Goodman (SikTh) — plus MANY more as players upload their own
- Enhanced visuals and sharper gameplay feedback

Why BEATABLE is unlike anything you've played before:

[media]
🎵 Feel the music—lightning-fast response with real, tactile feedback

[media]
🌊 Seamless, intuitive gameplay—every beat feels effortless, so you flow with the music

[media]
🎯 Instant calibration—jump into the action in seconds

No controllers. No limits. Just pure rhythm.

Please join our Discord to share feedback: https://discord.gg/TcNRzTaMp5

PS-Creators: it's safe to stream any tune by 'XRG Beats'

"Once you see it you wonder why no one had this genius idea before." Antony “Skarredghost” Vitillo
